content: up the face/heart half you set aside and single_crochet 18 single_crochet in the rem 9 unworked sts 36 sts round 5 single_crochet 4 decrease 6 times 30 sts round 6 single_crochet 3 decrease 6 times 24 sts round 7 single_crochet 4 decrease 4 times 20 sts round 8 single_crochet 3 decrease 4 times 16 sts round 9 single_crochet 2 decrease 4 times 12 sts stu� heart worked in d do not stu� face worked in b round 10 decrease 6 times 6 sts attach face flatten the face with a and size f 3 75mm hook slip_stitch 1 chain 1 st st 1 into the side edge of the face to join yarn slip_stitch around entire edge of face shape cut yarn and fasten o� leaving a long tail for sewing pin face to upper half of star s body and sew copyright©2023disneyenterprises incandmkcrochet&knits allrightsreserved nopartofthispatternmaybereproducedortransmittedinanyformwithoutwritten permissionfromthecopyrightholders embroider face with c outline the eyes and mouth shapes with back stitches apply a satin stitch between the back stitches to fill in the eye and mouth shapes apply a long stitch along the edges of the mouth and eye satin stitches to outline the edges applying small overcast stitches if needed to hold the outline stitches in place to tighten up the mouth corners loop a few stitches around the corners of the mouth s outline stitches optional- cut out the eye and mouth shapes out of felt and glue or sew them on finish and attach heart apply a few stitches between the inner edges of the upper halves of the heart and pull to bring the halves closer together with a 12 piece of d attach back of heart to the front of star s body near the right arm then take rem yarn tail and attach it to the top surface of the left arm allowing it to drape in front of the body trim any leftover length if desired copyright©2023disneyenterprises incandmkcrochet&knits allrightsreserved nopartofthispatternmaybereproducedortransmittedinanyformwithoutwritten permissionfromthecopyrightholders
